Unrecognized processes or scripts exhibi.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4663, Zeek conn.log, Zeek file.log
Unrecognized processes or scripts exhibi.Action: Monitor process creation (Event ID 4688). Correlate new or unknown processes with file access events (Event ID 4663) indicating traversal of sensitive directories. Correlate process activity and file access with network connections (Zeek conn.log) and file transfer details (Zeek file.log). Analyze network traffic patterns associated with file transfers initiated by these processes.

Recurring network connections from inter.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log data. Group network connections by source IP, destination IP, destination port, and time of day. Identify connection groups where connections occur at statistically similar times over multiple days or weeks using time series analysis or correlation analysis on connection timestamps. Investigate connections with high correlation to specific times of day or regular intervals.
